name: SPACE ROCKS (itch) (Nordaca)
description:
THREE LIVES.

ONE THOUSAND POINTS TO EARN.

Blast asteroids and listen to a jamming soundtrack in 2021's BEST GAME EVER, Space Rocks! 

(Please note, this game is in no way affiliated with Atari and any legal action will be closed due to the content being transformative in nature. Any legal action will be counter-acted. I have lawyers.)
